data.prayer: the county of Palakkad has (about) 30,909 people who know Jesus, 34,093 people who know about him culturally, and 2,744,898 people who are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Palakkad, Kerala, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Palakkad, Kerala, India from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Palakkad that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Palakkad, Kerala, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Chakkan people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 30,909 believers in Palakkad, Kerala, India a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Palakkad.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Palakkad, Kerala, India has a population of 2,809,900.

We estimate Palakkad has 30,909 people who might know Jesus, 34,093 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,744,898 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Palakkad, Kerala, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
